title: Compare the goals of Spanish and English colonies

content.question:
Answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly explain ONE important similarity between the goals of the Spanish and the English in establishing colonies in the Americas prior to 1700.

Briefly explain ONE important difference between the goals of the Spanish and the English in establishing colonies in the Americas prior to 1700.

Briefly explain ONE way in which the difference you indicated in (b) contributed to a difference in the development of Spanish and English colonial societies.

frqParts.text:
Answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly explain ONE way in which the difference you indicated in (b) contributed to a difference in the development of Spanish and English colonial societies.

topic.text: 1.5: Labor, Slavery, and Caste in the Spanish Colonial System

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
